verses.verse: Peter, <S%G4074><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to the strangers <S%G3927><s%> scattered <S%G1290><s%> throughout Pontus, <S%G4195><s%> Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> Cappadocia, <S%G2587><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> and Bithynia, <S%G978><s%>

Elect <S%G1588><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the foreknowledge <S%G4268><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> to obedience <S%G5218><s%> and sprinkling <S%G4473><s%> of the blood <S%G129><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you, and peace, <S%G1515><s%> be multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be the God <S%G2316><s%> and Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his abundant <S%G4183><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> has begotten <S%G313><s%> us again <S%G313><s%> to a lively <S%G2198><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> by the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%>
To an inheritance <S%G2817><s%> incorruptible, <S%G862><s%> and undefiled, <S%G283><s%> and that fades <S%G268><s%> not away, reserved <S%G5083><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> for you,

Who <S%G3588><s%> are kept <S%G5432><s%> by the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> to salvation <S%G4991><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> to be revealed <S%G601><s%> in the last <S%G2078><s%> time. <S%G2540><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> you greatly rejoice, <S%G21><s%> though now <S%G737><s%> for a season, <S%G3641><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> need <S%G1163><s%> be, you are in heaviness <S%G3076><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> manifold <S%G4164><s%> temptations: <S%G3986><s%>

That the trial <S%G1383><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more precious <S%G5093><s%> than of gold <S%G5553><s%> that perishes, <S%G622><s%> though it be tried <S%G1381><s%> with fire, <S%G4442><s%> might be found <S%G2147><s%> to praise <S%G1868><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the appearing <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> having not seen, <S%G1492><s%> you love; <S%G25><s%> in whom, though now <S%G737><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> him not, yet <S%G1161><s%> believing, <S%G4100><s%> you rejoice <S%G21><s%> with joy <S%G5479><s%> unspeakable <S%G412><s%> and full of glory: <S%G1392><s%>
Receiving <S%G2865><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> even the salvation <S%G4991><s%> of your souls. <S%G5590><s%>

Of which <S%G3739><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> have inquired <S%G1567><s%> and searched <S%G1830><s%> diligently, who <S%G3588><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> that should come to you:

Searching <S%G2045><s%> what, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5101><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> manner <S%G4169><s%> of time <S%G2540><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was in them did signify, <S%G1213><s%> when it testified <S%G4303><s%> beforehand <S%G4303><s%> the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and the glory <S%G1391><s%> that should follow. <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%>

To whom <S%G3739><s%> it was revealed, <S%G601><s%> that not to themselves, <S%G1438><s%> but to us they did minister <S%G1247><s%> the things, <S%G846><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are now <S%G3568><s%> reported <S%G312><s%> to you by them that have preached <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to you with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> down from heaven; <S%G3772><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> things the angels <S%G32><s%> desire <S%G1937><s%> to look <S%G3879><s%> into. <S%G1519><s%>

Why <S%G1352><s%> gird <S%G328><s%> up the loins <S%G3751><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> mind, <S%G1271><s%> be sober, <S%G3525><s%> and hope <S%G1679><s%> to the end <S%G5049><s%> for the grace <S%G5485><s%> that is to be brought <S%G5342><s%> to you at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

As obedient <S%G5218><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> not fashioning <S%G4964><s%> yourselves according <S%G2596><s%> to the former <S%G4386><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> ignorance: <S%G52><s%>
But as he which has called <S%G2564><s%> you is holy, <S%G40><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> be you holy <S%G40><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> manner of conversation; <S%G391><s%>
Because <S%G1360><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Be you holy; <S%G40><s%> for I am <S%G1510><s%> holy. <S%G40><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> you call <S%G1941><s%> on <S%G1941><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> without <S%G678><s%> respect <S%G678><s%> of persons <S%G678><s%> judges <S%G2919><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> man's work, <S%G2041><s%> pass <S%G390><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> sojourning <S%G3940><s%> here in fear: <S%G5401><s%>

For as much as you know <S%G1492><s%> that you were not redeemed <S%G3084><s%> with corruptible <S%G5349><s%> things, as silver <S%G694><s%> and gold, <S%G5553><s%> from your <S%G5216><s%> vain <S%G3152><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%> received by tradition from your <S%G5216><s%> fathers; <S%G3970><s%>
But with the precious <S%G5093><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> as of a lamb <S%G286><s%> without <S%G784><s%> blemish <S%G299><s%> and without <S%G784><s%> spot: <S%G784><s%>

Who truly <S%G3303><s%> was foreordained <S%G4267><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but was manifest <S%G5319><s%> in these <S%G3588><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> times <S%G5550><s%> for you,

Who <S%G3588><s%> by him do believe <S%G4100><s%> in God, <S%G2316><s%> that raised <S%G1453><s%> him up from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> him glory; <S%G1391><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and hope <S%G1680><s%> might be in God. <S%G2316><s%>

Seeing you have purified <S%G48><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> in obeying <S%G5218><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> to unfeigned <S%G505><s%> love <S%G5360><s%> of the brothers, <S%G5360><s%> see that you love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> with a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> fervently: <S%G1619><s%>

Being born <S%G313><s%> again, <S%G313><s%> not of corruptible <S%G5349><s%> seed, <S%G4701><s%> but of incorruptible, <S%G862><s%> by the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which lives <S%G2198><s%> and stays <S%G3306><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%>

For all <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> is as grass, <S%G5528><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> as the flower <S%G438><s%> of grass. <S%G5528><s%> The grass <S%G5528><s%> wither, <S%G3583><s%> and the flower <S%G438><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> falls <S%G1601><s%> away: <S%G1601><s%>

But the word <S%G4487><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> endures <S%G3306><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%> And this <S%G5124><s%> is the word <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> by the gospel <S%G2097><s%> is preached <S%G2097><s%> to you.
